alert.note: Alert for De Baca; Guadalupe (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 4:14PM MDT until June 03 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central De Baca County in east central New Mexico... Southwestern Guadalupe County in east central New Mexico... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 413 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pastura, or 18 miles northeast of Vaughn, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa, Vaughn, Puerto De Luna, Pastura and Pintada. This includes the following highways... Highway 285 between Mile Markers 201 and 204. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 272 and 300. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
